sent.orig: These verbs mean to reprimand or criticize angrily or vehemently.
sent.trans: 这些动词意为愤怒或恶毒地斥责或批评。

sent.orig: Would you like to read and criticize my new book?
sent.trans: 您愿不愿意读我的新书并评论它一下？

sent.orig: Supporters of intelligent design criticize the science of evolution.
sent.trans: “智能设计”的支持者批评进化论。

sent.orig: Our style is novel, quality control, 5 the pieces rise to criticize, can mix the batch.
sent.trans: 我们的款式新颖，质量保证，5件起批，可以混批。

sent.orig: He hates to hear criticism and hates to be criticize.
sent.trans: 他讨厌听到批评，也不喜欢被批评。
